title: Very clean/bright 2 bedroom in Belmont! Parking and updated kitchen
posting_body: ['A great location near stores, restaurants and public transportation.', 'For a showing call or text Karen at 617-320-9511.', 'PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 14519602', 'Rent: $2,300 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Parking:: attached garage', 'This is a very nice 2 bedroom on second floor.', 'Ready to move in and enjoy!', 'FEATURES', '2 car parking', 'Ceramic Tiles', 'Dedicated parking', 'Dining Room', 'Energy Efficient Windows', 'Fireplace (Decorative)', 'Fresh Paint work', 'Internet', 'New Appliances', 'New Kitchen Counters', 'New/Renovated Kitchen', 'Storage', 'cable/internet ready', 'dishwasher', 'enclosed three season porch', 'garage', 'gas stove', 'hardwood floors', 'landscaping by owner', 'near 73 bus', 'new gas heating system', 'new kitchen cabinets', 'new lighting fixtures', 'newly finished hardwood floors', 'refrigerator', 'walk-up attic', 'washer & dryer hookup', 'yard']
